product_id: If not pass, it will be automatically updated to t0 according to the market table
If not pass, the settle date will be updated according to tradedate
If close option position, please input 'F'.
If ex-clearing please input the clearing account .
1 £ºas AGENT for you we bought/sold this security
2 : as PRINCIPAL we have bought from, or sold to you this security
4 : as AGENT for both buyger and seller we are charging a commission, the amount of which will be furnished upon written request
6 : our firm maintains a primary market in this security and from time to time the firm or its officers or employees may have a long or short position and buy or sell the security of this company
9 : as principal on the exchange floor
C : used in as agent trading in money market securities; reflects trades run as agent for the issuer
D : used in as agent trading in money market securities; reflects dealer placement trades run as agent. Used when a customer buys from inventory
I : used in as agent trading in money market securities; reflects dealer placement trades run as agent. Used when an inventory account buys from the issuer
P : for primary BA trading; reflects principal trades involving customer participation in the specific acceptances. The system automatically allocates loan number(s) from an inventory on a FIFO basis

market: unique order id in same external id.

product_id: If these columns are empty, the system calculates them automatically, otherwise the input value is taken
